医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
最近的医院合并给您带来了高昂的医疗费用十年前，当马克·芬尼 (Mark Finney) 与年轻的家人搬到弗吉尼亚州西南部时，有不同的医院系统和一系列独立医生可供选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Your-exorbitant-medical-bill-brought-to-you-by-the-latest-hospital-merger.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Your-exorbitant-medical-bill-brought-to-you-by-the-latest-hospital-merger.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=211356ad-3280-4a6b-a4b0-4f1e89ea1bb8 Fri, 11 Aug 2023 06:49:30 -0400 Your exorbitant medical bill, brought to you by the latest hospital merger
新的阿尔茨海默氏症药物带来了希望，同时也带来了问题FDA 已批准 Leqembi，这是第一个针对早期阿尔茨海默氏症及其先兆病症——轻度认知障碍的疾病缓解疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/New-Alzheimere28099s-drug-raises-hopes-e28094-along-with-questions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/New-Alzheimere28099s-drug-raises-hopes-e28094-along-with-questions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80cbd35c-68be-4cf0-9476-092759f8a34e Fri, 11 Aug 2023 06:48:20 -0400 New Alzheimer’s drug raises hopes — along with questions
筛查癌症的血液测试：弊大于利吗？到 2021 年夏天，小吉尔伯特·米拉姆 (Gilbert Milam Jr.) 过上了美好的生活。米拉姆（Milam）是一位全国知名的说唱歌手，以伯纳（Berner）的名义表演，他也享受着 Cookies 的全球扩张，这是他共同创立的大麻产品和服装品牌，并担任首席执行官。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/A-blood-test-that-screens-for-cancer-Does-it-do-more-harm-than-good.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/A-blood-test-that-screens-for-cancer-Does-it-do-more-harm-than-good.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60d9b17d-6ca1-41f5-a331-89aa417c367e Fri, 11 Aug 2023 06:46:47 -0400 A blood test that screens for cancer: Does it do more harm than good?
CRISPR/sgRNA-SAM疗法：帕金森病的潜在突破？研究人员利用 CRISPR-Cas9 系统诱导帕金森病大鼠模型大脑中多巴胺 (DA) 的合成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/CRISPRsgRNA-SAM-therapy-a-potential-breakthrough-for-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/CRISPRsgRNA-SAM-therapy-a-potential-breakthrough-for-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7fd9d57-ae29-4ded-88dd-b9cab009d1ab Fri, 11 Aug 2023 04:36:00 -0400 CRISPR/sgRNA-SAM therapy: a potential breakthrough for Parkinson's disease?
人类食用昆虫的过去、现在和未来研究人员使用昆虫作为蛋白质、维生素和矿物质的可持续且环保的来源来审查数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/The-past-present-and-future-of-insects-for- human-conspiration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/The-past-present-and-future-of-insects-for- human-conspiration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=458fcb6a-8d3e-4afc-adf8-fd1b1117ee0d Fri, 11 Aug 2023 04:31:00 -0400 The past, present, and future of insects for human consumption
研究发现哮喘患者的关键锻炼有助于改善肺功能一项新的同行评审研究表明，瑜伽和呼吸控制练习与有氧训练相结合，对于寻求改善肺功能的哮喘患者来说尤其重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Key-exercises-for-asthmatic-people-help-improve-their-lung-function-finds-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Key-exercises-for-asthmatic-people-help-improve-their-lung-function-finds-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3982a191-e26f-4743-843a-298eeaf0fb3f Fri, 11 Aug 2023 02:39:22 -0400 Key exercises for asthmatic people help improve their lung function, finds study
个性化运动测试可能对减脂更有效西奈山伊坎医学院的研究人员报告说，燃烧脂肪的最佳心率因人而异，并且通常与商业健身器材上的“脂肪燃烧区域”不一致。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Personalized-exercise-testing-may-be-more- effective-for-fat-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Personalized-exercise-testing-may-be-more- effective-for-fat-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a599622b-c517-4b48-b357-13018a87a8e4 Fri, 11 Aug 2023 01:55:19 -0400 Personalized exercise testing may be more effective for fat loss
利用超声和人工智能研究烧伤创面特征和愈合轨迹为了给受伤军人提供最好的护理，战地医务人员需要可靠的工具。为了开发更好的工具，他们召集了工程师。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Using-ultrasound-and-AI-to-investigate-the-characteristics-and-healing-trajectory-of-burn-wounds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Using-ultrasound-and-AI-to-investigate-the-characteristics-and-healing-trajectory-of-burn-wounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=987714b4-c256-4ef7-a462-bd28d3c908bb Fri, 11 Aug 2023 01:43:47 -0400 Using ultrasound and AI to investigate the characteristics and healing trajectory of burn wounds
COVID-19封锁可能导致对胃肠道病毒的免疫力减弱在美国首次发布居家令以遏制COVID-19传播后，诺如病毒、轮状病毒和腺病毒等胃肠道病毒几乎从加州社区消失，并在近两年内保持在非常低的水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Gastrointestinal-viruses-remained-at-very-low-levels-for-nearly-2-years-finds-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Gastrointestinal-viruses-remained-at-very-low-levels-for-nearly-2-years-finds-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38912d69-8232-43e0-973a-ffc38ffe2b63 Fri, 11 Aug 2023 01:20:00 -0400 COVID-19 lockdown may have led to waning immunity to gastrointestinal viruses
肠道微生物群可能影响癌症治疗的反应性和功效大量的微生物定植于人体，形成一个称为微生物群的生态群落。微生物群由细菌、病毒、真菌和古细菌组成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Gut-microbiota-could-affect-the-responsiveness-and-efficacy-of-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Gut-microbiota-could-affect-the-responsiveness-and-efficacy-of-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=813dc6af-dfbf-4fec-a50a-a38750c65d5d Fri, 11 Aug 2023 00:41:01 -0400 Gut microbiota could affect the responsiveness and efficacy of cancer treatment
